name: CyberpunkRPGGangs
0:
”Alexa, open cyberpunk gang”
”give me a gang”
”tell me a gang name”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cyberpunk gang
des: It always happens, you are playing your favorite Cyberpunk Genre tabletop RPG and your runners are doing some legwork in the barrens or the sprawl. They say something wrong and run afoul of a group of gangers from the umm...uhh..what do we call the gang? Well now you can ask Alexa, and she will tell you what to call them, freeing you up to roll initiative!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
